ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
¾ cup uncooked regular long-grain white rice

cookingTips: Don't stir rice after adding chicken; let it cook undisturbed
Cover with foil to trap steam and ensure rice cooks evenly
Let rest 5 minutes after cooking before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This classic one-dish meal is perfect for busy weeknights. Explain the importance of not stirring during cooking and how the rice absorbs flavors.
